title: Modern Studio near Trinity
description: A beautiful modern studio apartment located just 5 minutes walk from Trinity College. Fully furnished with high-speed internet included.

description: Spacious double room in a shared house. Ideal for MTU or UCC students. Parking space available.

title: City Centre Flat near DBS
description: Perfect location for DBS students. Right in the heart of the city with everything on your doorstep.
